attributes.name: instanceId
attributes.description: Internal identifier of the dpe instance.

attributes.name: id
attributes.description: Unique identifier of the dpe instance.

attributes.name: operationalStatus
attributes.description: Current operational statuses of the DPE.

attributes.name: health
attributes.description: Health information for the DPE, as defined by the health resource type.

attributes.name: needsReplacement
attributes.description:
Indicates whether the DPE needs replacement. Values are:
  • true - DPE needs replacement.
  • false - DPE does not need replacement.

attributes.name: parent
attributes.description: Resource type and unique identifier of the DPE's parent enclosure.

attributes.name: slotNumber
attributes.description: The enclosure number or position where the DPE is located on the bus.

attributes.name: name
attributes.description: DPE name.

attributes.name: manufacturer
attributes.description: Manufacturer of the DPE.

attributes.name: model
attributes.description: Manufacturer's model number for the DPE.

attributes.name: emcPartNumber
attributes.description: EMC part number for the DPE.

attributes.name: emcSerialNumber
attributes.description: EMC serial number for the DPE.

attributes.name: vendorPartNumber
attributes.description: Vendor part number for the DPE.

attributes.name: vendorSerialNumber
attributes.description: Vendor serial number for the DPE.

attributes.name: enclosureType
attributes.description: DPE enclosure type.

attributes.name: busId
attributes.description: Identifier of the SAS bus used by the DPE.

attributes.name: driveTypes
attributes.description: Disk type of the disks in the DPE.

attributes.name: currentPower
attributes.description: Current amount of power used by the DPE.

attributes.name: avgPower
attributes.description: Average amount of power used by the DPE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: maxPower
attributes.description: Maximum amout of power used by the DPE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: currentTemperature
attributes.description: Current temperature of the DPE.

attributes.name: avgTemperature
attributes.description: Average temperature of the DPE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: maxTemperature
attributes.description: Maximum temperature of the DPE. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: currentSpeed
attributes.description: Current speed of the DPE SAS disk connection.

attributes.name: maxSpeed
attributes.description: Maximum speed of the DPE SAS disk connection. The system uses a one hour window of 30-second samples to determine this value.

attributes.name: parentSystem
attributes.description: Parent system of the Disk Processor Enclosure (DPE).
